competitors.name: H&R Block
competitors.notes: Major tax preparation competitor with retail locations and software

competitors.name: Sage Intacct
competitors.notes: Cloud-based accounting software for small to mid-size businesses

competitors.name: Xero
competitors.notes: Cloud-based accounting software competitor (founded 2006, growing rapidly)

competitors.name: NetSuite
competitors.notes: Cloud ERP and accounting platform (acquired by Oracle 2016)

competitors.name: FreshBooks
competitors.notes: Cloud-based accounting software for small businesses and freelancers

context: In 2010, Intuit renamed its Canadian tax software from QuickTax to TurboTax, unifying branding. The accounting software market was transitioning to cloud-based solutions, with competitors like Xero and FreshBooks gaining traction.
